about_the_game:
With the "Autobahn North" Expansion for CityDriver, new routes, missions and locations await you!*

Expand the map of Munich with Autobahn and highway sections, including parts of the A9, B471 and A99. Explore new routes, show off your driving skills on the fast-paced Autobahn and master the challenges of the highway.

Gameplay is enhanced with the introduction of new pick-up and delivery missions. Take on jobs that lead you across the expanded map and prove your skills as a reliable driver. Transport people and goods and make sure you always arrive safely at your destination.

Discover new points of interest, including construction markets, recycling depots and traders. These locations not only offer additional pick-up and delivery options, but also add realism to the game world. Find the best routes to key locations to increase your efficiency in the game.

Get ready for new tours on the Autobahn and highways in the north of Munich!

*It is necessary to own the main game CityDriver to play this Expansion.

Gameplay is enhanced with the introduction of new pick-up and delivery missions. Take on jobs that lead you across the expanded map and prove your skills as a reliable driver. Transport people and goods and make sure you always arrive safely at your destination.

Discover new points of interest, including construction markets, recycling depots and traders. These locations not only offer additional pick-up and delivery options, but also add realism to the game world. Find the best routes to key locations to increase your efficiency in the game.

Get ready for new tours on the Autobahn and highways in the north of Munich!

name: CityDriver - Autobahn Nord

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: from 2.9 GHz AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or Intel Core i5--10400F or newer
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT, each with 8 GB VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: integrated or dedicated compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: from 3.6 GHz, 8 cores
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 TI or AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT, each with 11 GB VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: integrated or dedicated compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: The system requirements mentioned here cannot cover all systems and configurations, so that in individual cases there may be compatibility problems that prevent or impact the game's runnability or performance.

short_description: With the "Autobahn North" DLC for CityDriver, new routes, missions and locations await you!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese
